author: tkstanczak
content:
The second meeting is split in two, with two different timezones (2pm UTC, 10pm UTC).
I will ensure that the knowledge flows from one timezone to the other.

Please visit the OASIS GitHub page ahead of the meeting and review links and comments and add your own:
https://github.com/ethereum-oasis/eth1.x-JSON-RPC-API-standard/issues/9

Best,
Tomasz

author: tkstanczak
content: <@!552133098075193354> <@!642887713246150666> <@!301186049323958275> are you the best people to open a new EIP for Artem for the gRPC spec?

author: sky.cactus
content: Just file a PR to create a new file in the EIPs directory following the template found here: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ethereum/EIPs/master/eip-template.md

author: sky.cactus
content: You can read <https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1> for more details on the process.

author: sky.cactus
content: It would be Standards Track, Interface

author: tkstanczak
content: https://github.com/ethereum-oasis/eth1.x-JSON-RPC-API-standard/issues/17

author: tkstanczak
content: Hi <@!642887713246150666>, I have heard that the Cat Herders would like to organize a Peep an EIP session on EIP-1474 (JSON Standardization). Please have a look at the link below. This would be great to organize The sooner, the bettter.

author: tkstanczak
content: There has been a consistent ask for tooling support for the new spec. There is a suggestion to run Open RPC effort to match any spec created so that everyone can get familiarised with it and provide feedback. The outcome of our calls may be the spec in the EIP format (EIP-1474 extension), an Open RPC spec and the ethereum.org hosted spec.

author: tkstanczak
content: https://github.com/ethereum-oasis/eth1.x-JSON-RPC-API-standard/issues/16
